Text: she made no sense. she laughed at herself and talked about nothing the whole time. she was funny, but everyone in the class didnt get her.
MMMk MMMk she microwaves her coffe the whole class period and has no clue what she's teaching!!! its all busy work!!
She made us be quiet by yelling at us and telling us if she strained her vocal cords, she'd throw up...
she's extremely annoying, all she ever does is tell random stories about stupid stuff, and her class is VERY dull... horrible teacher.
when mrs trenery takes us to art class they talk for an hour in her classroom and leave us standing in the hall its really boring and we never finish ANYTHING
All he talks about is his kids, and he has no idea what he is talking about. I didn't learn anything in his class, at all.
She knows what shes doing but rambles on to much on weird stories and other topics not concerning chem
She has no idea what she is talking about. She is not funny and not knowledgeable

She has no idea what is going on in the class. It's so pointless. I doubt she even knows what comes out of her mouth half the time. It's sad because she is nice, but for whatever reason shes just incompetent.
Does not let me stand by the door before the bell rings, she is always telling to do stuff, she is not fairdoes not let me sit in the teachers chair,
A joke, doesn't teach. He lets numerous kids and baseball players that do not belong in his class skip to his class during class hours. I got an A yet i didn't do any work, only because i was a girl.
he is a teacher that you the whole class can leave the room and he really DOESNT notice. he's at NW now!

Dr. Healy Wow, All we do is sit in class and draw and listen to him talk about how proud he is of all his art and him telling us not to bother him while he is painting. Lets just call him "different".
She is not a good teacher. She spends more time talking about useless things and not even touching on S.S. im very unhappy to have her as a teacher.
the only good ratings for this man are written by him, now thats depressing. and how come he can joke but when we talk he attacks us?
Mrs. Yslas had made my life a living hell. She gives way too much homework and doesn't even teach half of the stuff. She makes your life miserable, so you better pray you never get her.
Were they kidding with this one? Is she some kind of joke? Who picked her as the best teacher for our band? She couldn't keep a bunch of mutes quiet, let alone us!
This guy the borin'est teacher in the math department, he tells stories that are irrelevant to the topic. ZZZZZzzzzzz
ONE OF THE WORST TEACHERS I'VE EVER HAD. he was awful. he was on the computer or watching the news the whole time. didn't have control of his class at all. easy

Instead of teaching the material in class he will spend most of the period going over homework while other people sleep. Then he will constantly attack you for not going to tutoring and/or missing homework. Very exasperating and dull, he just does not realize that what goes on in the classroom is just as, if not more, important then what goes on at home.
Her entire class is basically this, "sit down, be quiet, type random gibberish" She is not a mean teacher, but not a fun 1 either. i just didn't like her class
he spends all of class lecturing, but his tests had little to do with the lectures. he can't relate to his students at all, and will yell at his class depending on his mood
She talks to her self constantly! Its so annoying.. she rips apart everything ne one says! Shes the WORST teacher ever!
He can be Funny at times! and Just annoying the next, he needs To be Clearer In talking and Should slow down. He needs to also go over Stuff more since its geometry!
Always talks about all the stuff he did at Los Alamos. Doesn't do much in class, mostly talks about himself, sometimes goes over homework problems, takes forever to grade stuff. Shouldn't teach AC.
I like her as a person but cmon she does no know how to work with teens. I hear her 6 hour walks all over her
when i saw her i struggled not to laugh u could do about anything in her class without her knowing. funny times!!!!!
i dont think i've learned a thing in this guys class. all we do is talk about sports and watch pointless movies. (not that i'm complainig or anything)
Mr. Porter is a nerd.He can not spell, seriously he can't, he can not teach all he does is sit at the over head and talk about stuff no one cares about.........

Probably the most pretentious person I've ever met. Spends more time talking about his vacation to Italy then anything else. Still very easy course work you could spit in his face everyday and still get a B-.
He was fun at times but, annoying and mean at others. IT was an easy class. He did not teach anyhting and he just told stories about his life.
Don't take his class if you take the subject seriously, because he doesn't. I had him for sociology, and yes he's funny but I didn't learn a thing. He talks about himself the whole time. Not good.
he is very ........ never mind. his tests are easy, he is generous, but he does spend too much time talking nonstop.
i can't believe this woman is teaching kids. she is very emotional. She talks down to the kids and yells when they ask a question to be repeated
i have to say, he didnt teach at all. all we did was read the book in class and do the homework. no structure, didnt know what he was talking about, not much help either.
he makes jokes, but i dont really think its funny i just go along with it(he says jokes over and over again)
This guy is hilarious! he doesn't try to be, but being in this class will give you some great moment.
She's nice from time to time, but the woman has no idea how to run a classroom and she picks favorites. It's freaking annoying.
When she talks does her voice seem to droan on and on forever or is it just me? She wore the purple outfit today...if you have ever had her you know that one.

Mr. Large is the worst teacher ever! He talks in a voice no one can hear nor understand. He gives people detention for no reason. For example, while doing our work, he told the class we could talk. So, everyone was talking and he comes up to me and my friends tells us that we're talking talking about something science related and gave us a detain even though no one was talking about anything science related! If you get his class, I suggest you switch out of it...fast! Not one student likes him!
